ygData.subject: Re: Re: Jig vs Selo fatigue
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Hmm, I always thought it was just reducing the fatigue associated with running.  I ll have to try it while fighting. Good idea!  The stamina regeneration
ygData.messageBody:
On Thu, 7 Oct 1999, Zoie wrote:
>
> The (warrior, I assume) wanted the Jig's fatigue reduction. In The Official
> Player's Guide the description of Selo's is:
>
> "Party: Increased movement and fatigue".
>
> I am assuming that they mean fatigue reduction by this
> (the abbreviations are a little cryptic). I have used the
> fatigue reduction during solos w/ to work on peircing/1h
> blunt skills (I miss a lot, so the fight lasts forever)
> and see the stamina bar go back up. Has anyone else tried
> Selo's for fatigue reduction?

Hmm, I always thought it was just reducing the fatigue
associated with running. I'll have to try it while fighting.

Good idea! The stamina regeneration of Jig is just huge
though - almost a full bubble every pulse.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
